author: kdy1
message:
build: Update `swc_core` to `v19.0.0` (#77669)

### What?

Update `swc_core`. ChangeLog: https://github.com/swc-project/swc/compare/swc_core%40v16.10.0...swc_core%40v19.0.0

### Why?

To keep in sync with `@swc/core`. 

### How?
